Articles.Content:
So I would love to be able to toggle my contracts to being shown or not. Reason is when I build a ship, I have a couple contracts in mind, and when I launch I only want to see those contracts so that I know when and where I need to trigger them.

Is that in the game at all? if not, it really should be.

Contracts Window Plus does that: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/91034

Contract Manager (http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/89851) allows sorting, but not (yet) mission-specific contracts.
